'''Opportunistic Gain''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to allow a [[Floating Hydro Fungus]] to trap a [[Fungus]] of a different type inside its bubble. This achievement will not be granted if the Floating Hydro Fungus traps another Floating Hydro Fungus.
